Description: * {{PageRef|Silence Glyph}}: Spirit damage scaling reduced from 1.5 to 1.0
* {{PageRef|Silence Glyph}}: Cast range reduced from 40m to 25m
* {{PageRef|Silence Glyph}}: Spirit Shield reduced from +225 to +200
* {{PageRef|Return Fire}}: Bullet damage returned reduced form 80% to 70%
* Dying with {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}} stacks will now cause you to lose 2 stacks no matter who killed you (rather than returning 1 only if the victim killed you back)
* Fixed {{PageRef|Siphon Bullets}} acting as spirit damage for procs
* {{PageRef|Ivy}}: {{PageRef|Air Drop}} now silences the ally being carried until they are released
* {{PageRef|Shiv}}: {{PageRef|Bloodletting}} incoming damage deferred reduced from 40% to 35%
* Fixed shotgun heroes applying buildup effects like toxic bullets instantly on ricocheted enemies
* Parrying a {{PageRef|Guardian}} now causes it to stop trying to repeatedly melee (and get parried over and over), and instead causes the boss to start shooting shortly there after
